title.rendered: Thriving Online: A Webinar About Digital Safety on October 8

content.rendered:
On October 8, digital safety expert Adam Dodge will offer a webinar for families titled “Thriving Online:  A Conversation About Digital Safety.”  This informative webinar will be held through zoom at 6:30 p.m. Click here to watch the virtual webinar.

Today, our families are spending more time online and on our devices than ever before, which exposes us to unique harms and risks. This is especially true considering people will say and do things online that they wouldn’t in the physical world. Luckily, we don’t need to be tech experts to address and avoid these situations – and keep ourselves and our families digitally safe.  In this interactive and engaging talk, Adam Dodge will explore practical strategies for navigating common and emerging digital dangers facing children today, such as online scams, catfishing, cyberflashing, image abuse, and more.
